descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2rgi8m9.png[/img]

[center][size=+3][color=green]Imperial Ranger Corps[/color][/size][/center]
[size=+2][color=red]Attention: The new File should now work properly[/color][/size] 

[size=+1.5]This is my first mod for Skyrim, and my first mod that isnt extremly simple or just a retexture. So please bare with me.
This mod aims to add an entire new guild to the game, for archers who are not evil so dont want to leen to the Dark Brotherhood
because all the  murder, but also dont like the theivery aspect of Theives guild, while at the same time dont see your self
as a warrior so the compaions guild is out. With the Rangers Guild you will still have lots of adventure with radiant quests
that have to do with hunting, spieing and infiltrating. with what i hope to be a very deep main quest to stop an evil band of mages
that is all i will say about the main quest now.[/size]

==========================================================================================================================
[size=+2][color=red]Project team:[/color][/size]
[center][size=+1.2][color=red]creator and Author[/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=green]TAGamingMaxed[/color][/center]

..............................................................[color=green]Nexus[/color]...................................................[color=green]steam[/color]
...........................................................==========............................................==========
..........................................................[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2083174][color=green]Disconsented[/color][/url]...........................................[color=green]Disconsented[[/color]

.............................................................[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3812547][color=green]SuriamJ[/color][/url]..............................................[color=green][HB] Suriam[/color]

........................................................[color=green]Oblivionfreak76[/color]....................................[color=green]The Lonesome Ranger[/color]

................................................................[color=red]N/A[/color]................................................[color=green]Flammenzunge[/color]

................................................................[color=red]N/A[/color]...................................................[color=green]silfer839[/color]

remember to check out there work! :)

=========================================================================================================================================
[center][size=+2][color=red]REQUIREMENTS[/color][/size]

[color=red]Skyrim patch 1.6 or higher, or else the scripts wont fire right and you wont be able to start the quest line.[/color]

=========================================================================================================================================
[size=+2][color=green]INSTALATION[/color][/size][/center]

[color=red]WARNING: UPDATING FROM BETA.0.0.3 OR BELLOW;Completly delete the mod and create a clean save. Then reinstal the mod.[/color]


[color=green]Just use the NMM, or manuly download and extract the .esp, Scripts, and Sound to the Skyrim Data folder[/color]

=====================================================================================================================================
To Start the quest line sit down at the new bar located in the Drunken Huntsman
=====================================================================================================
[size=2][u]The mod will include:[/u][/size]

Deep and imersive main quest, with plenty of side quests

Custom Ranger garb and weapons

new followers... Man and beast

new mounts

New powers that will feel at home in the forest and wilds

And the ability to raise to the top of another guild, complete with new player living space


=========================================================================================
[size=2][u]Credits:[/u][/size]

[list=1]
[*]John Flanagan and his series The Rangers Apprentice
[*]Bethesda: for the Great Game, and the all mighty CK 
[/list]

==========================================================================================
Contact me here on nexus or on steam as the same name if you would like to help the project.
author: TAGamingMaxed
